description: Titus and his boyfriend are back together and they’re celebrating the occasion with dinner! His bf’s dad, muscular Myles Landon, is invited as their special guest and young Titus engages in a special game of footsy or, in this case, “dicksy”. Stroking Myles’s dick with his feet and vice versa, Titus’s boyfriend catches them in the act and storms off. What else are the two horny men to do but fuck it out?
title: Living That Ho Life Part 3
